page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content: Walton is a good place for entertainment and attracts lots of holiday-makers. Near the sea front there is a crazy golf course as well as an amusement arcade that has lots of games and pool tables. Most of the people that come to Walton visit the Pier because it has a lot to offer. Attractions on the Pier includes: Ten-pin bowling,computer games,rides, (Ghost-trains,roundabouts,etc.) and of course there is Bingo. The end of the Pier is used regularly by fishermen because it is very long, actually the longest in England. The biggest attraction in Walton is the beach and sea. Lots of holiday-makers come to Walton because of these features.
